Description:
Prepare necessary paperwork (contracts, leases, acknowledgements etc)
Determine the financial capabilities and needs of clients in order to recommend solutions that are tailored to their circumstances.
Create and maintain lists of leasing properties, providing accurate and detailed information on their location, features, and square footage.
Utilize intermediate-level negotiation skills during lease processes, guiding clients on market conditions, pricing, legal requirements, and other pertinent factors to guarantee transparent and equitable transactions.Skills
Skills:
Excellent communication skills, along with a confident persuasive personality
Demonstrating strong organizational and time-management abilities.
Effective communication skills and the ability to confidently persuade others.
Maintain current knowledge of real estate market trends and best practices.
